pages.text: The $(mob)Gryphon$() is flying animal that spawns in Extreme Hills during the day in the $(thing)Overworld$(). It is immune to falling damage. It will not attack players unless provoked, at which point it will strike with leaping melee attacks with strong knockback that inflict $(thing)Slowness$() on contact.
$(mob)Gryphons$() drop $(item)Iron Nuggets$() in death, which can be combined to make $(item)Iron Ingots$().

$(mob)Gryphons$() drop $(item)Iron Box$() on death, which can be right-clicked while in hand to open and receive a random tool, weapon, or armor piece made of iron. Alternatively, it can be smelted in a furnace to create $(item)Crystalized Experience (Small)$().
